question: The "Devon Island", the largest uninhabited island/desert island in the world, is located in which nation?
explanation: Devon Island, the largest uninhabited island or the desert island in the world, is located in Canada. An uninhabited island, also known as a desert island, is an island that is not permanently populated by the humans. Devon Island is located in the Baffin Bay. Cape Liddon, an Important Bird Area (IBA), is located in theDevon Island.
